nodes.text: The title of Syndic was a designation of rank used in some societies, particularly among the Chiss.
Several distinct pieces of evidence go some way toward defining the title of Syndic as used among the Chiss.

On present knowledge, it is hard to infer the underlying structures behind these varied references with any confidence, although further information will no doubt enable fuller analysis. It can, additionally, be noted that the title of Syndic was not exclusively restricted to the Chiss. For instance, Talon Karrde sometimes used the alias of Syndic Pandis Hart, chief purchasing agent of the planetary council on the planet Sif-Uwana.
